kubejs.ponder.dirt.grass.text_2: However you can put grass blocks next to it to make it green
kubejs.ponder.dirt.grass.text_1: This is dirt, contrary to popular belief it is not green
kubejs.ponder.dirt.basic_usage.text_1: Blocks can be placed by right clicking another block
kubejs.ponder.dirt.basic_usage.text_2: And fun fact: You can break it too! Who knew you can mine in MINEcraft?
kubejs.ponder.dirt.hoeing.text_1: You can hoe dirt and grass blocks to grow plants on them!
kubejs.ponder.dirt.hoeing.text_2: But without water they turn back into dirt blocks
kubejs.ponder.ethylene.whole_setup.text_: The Gas Burning Generator makes FE as it burns certain gases
kubejs.ponder.test.multi_scene_test.head: Yes rainbow sheep is cool
kubejs.ponder.test.multi_scene_test.text: This is sheep. It's boring and not rainbow!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
kubejs.ponder.ethylene.whole_setup.text_: This Pondering will show you how to make it, step by step
The best gas to make is Ethylene. It has a bit of setup but works forever
kubejs.ponder.ethylene.making_biofuel.te: This is much too complex, so let's trim it to just the first step
Use any item pipe to move the Slices to the Crusher
The Cloche grows Melon blocks, and a Compacting Drawer can turn it into Slices
The Crusher crushes Melon Slices into Bio Fuel
Melons are the best, since it grows a block that can be crafted into 9 items. The Garden Cloche is a great compact way to grow it
The first thing we need is Bio Fuel, which can be made using almost any plant matter
kubejs.ponder.ethylene.hydrogen.text_1: The next thing we need is Hydrogen, which is fairly easy
kubejs.ponder.ethylene.hydrogen.text_2: The Electrolytic Separator converts Water into Hydrogen and Oxygen. The Oxygen can just be dumped.
kubejs.ponder.ethylene.hydrogen.text_3: Of course, that means you have to provide it with water
kubejs.ponder.ethylene.hydrogen.text_4: Water must be supplied to the Garden Cloche and the Electrolytic Separator
kubejs.ponder.ethylene.whole_setup.text_: Go to the next scene at the bottom to see the next step
kubejs.ponder.ethylene.hydrogen.text_5: Make sure you're pulling out of the correct side! You need OXYGEN, not Hydrogen
kubejs.ponder.ethylene.ethylene.text_6: This setup makes more power than it uses, and requires zero upkeep
kubejs.ponder.ethylene.ethylene.text_3: Another pipe here to move the Bio Fuel as well
kubejs.ponder.ethylene.ethylene.text_2: That means you'll have to supply it with Water
kubejs.ponder.ethylene.ethylene.text_5: Ethylene comes out of the front of the PRC and into the Gas-Burning Generator, and it begins to generate power!
kubejs.ponder.ethylene.ethylene.text_4: Supply all 4 machines with power, and they'll start to work!
kubejs.ponder.ethylene.ethylene.text_1: The Pressurized Reaction Chamber combines Bio Fuel, Hydrogen, and Water to make Ethylene
